posts.name: Lakamsani
posts.cooked:
The steps here don‚Äôt work.

./ngc-cli/ngc: cannot execute binary file: Exec format error

docs.nvidia.com

NGC ‚Äî DGX Spark User Guide

NVIDIA GPU Cloud (NGC) Usage on DGX Spark
Hi lakamsani, you setup NGC CLI via NGC ‚Äî DGX Spark User Guide , correct?

posts.name: Lakamsani
posts.cooked:
yes, I setup NGC CLI via the guide

If we follow the instructions on the guide i.e.

# Download and install NGC CLI
wget https://ngc.nvidia.com/downloads/ngccli_linux.zip

The binary in the zip file is x86 and not ARM.

posts.name: Lakamsani
posts.cooked:
got it work.

I managed to get it to work by setting up qemu emulation and download amd x86 C libraries, thanks to help from Claude code. But I think Nvidia should provide an ARM binary so we don‚Äôt need to do this. Or if there is an ARM binary, please document it at ‚Äú NGC ‚Äî DGX Spark User Guide . Thanks.

vamsee@dgxspark:~$ file /home/vamsee/downloads/ngc-cli/ngc
/home/vamsee/downloads/ngc-cli/ngc: ELF 64-bit LSB executable, x86-64, version 1 (SYSV), dynamically linked, interpreter /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2, BuildID[sha1]=3dfe013b3027047470d1aac10a3504baf6969725, for GNU/Linux 2.6.32, stripped
vamsee@dgxspark:~$ ngc --version
NGC CLI 4.6.6
vamsee@dgxspark:~$ uname -a
Linux dgxspark 6.11.0-1016-nvidia #16-Ubuntu SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Sun Sep 21 16:52:46 UTC 2025 aarch64 aarch64 aarch64 GNU/Linux
vamsee@dgxspark:~$

=== Steps to get it work ===

  1. sudo dpkg --add-architecture amd64

  2. sudo apt install qemu-user-static binfmt-support

  3. sudo update-binfmts --enable qemu-x86_64

  4. sudo systemctl restart systemd-binfmt.service;

  5. add this to /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ubuntu-amd64.sources

    Types: deb
URIs: http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/
Suites: noble noble-updates noble-backports
Components: main restricted universe multiverse
Architectures: amd64
Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

Types: deb
URIs: http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/
Suites: noble-security
Components: main restricted universe multiverse
Architectures: amd64
Signed-By: /usr/share/keyrings/ubuntu-archive-keyring.gpg

6.sudo apt update

sudo apt install -y libc6:amd64

sudo apt install -y zlib1g:amd64

You can find the ARM64 Linux version on the NGC CLI installers page: https://org.ngc.nvidia.com/setup/installers/cli, click on the on the ARM64 Linux tab and follow the instructions at the bottom to get setup.

posts.name: Lakamsani
posts.cooked:
Perfect. Thanks üëç

If we can get the instructions updated in the NGC CLI guide, that would be awesome. I will switch my Spark to that official arm Linux binary

posts.name: Aniculescu
posts.cooked: Official docs have been updated to make it more clear how to download the ARM version of NGC CLI
